0.text: Innate: Renekton's basic attacks generate  5 Fury, which expires by 1 Fury every 0.25 seconds after 12 seconds without dealing or taking damage.
0.html: Innate: Renekton's basic attacks generate 5 Fury, which expires by 1 Fury every 0.25 seconds after 12 seconds without dealing or taking damage.

1.text: While Renekton has at least 50 Fury, his next basic ability consumes 50 Fury to become empowered with an additional effect, and does not generate Fury.
1.html: While Renekton has at least 50 Fury, his next basic ability consumes 50 Fury to become empowered with an additional effect, and does not generate Fury.

2.text: Renekton generates 50% bonus Fury from all sources while  below 50% of his maximum health.
2.html: Renekton generates 50% bonus Fury from all sources while  below 50% of his maximum health.

0.text: Active: Renekton cleaves around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and  healing himself for each enemy hit, up to a cap.
0.html: Active: Renekton cleaves around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for each enemy hit, up to a cap.

1.text: Against  champions, the healing is increased by 300%.
1.html: Against champions, the healing is increased by 300%.

2.text: Renekton generates  2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per cast capped at 30.
2.html: Renekton generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per cast capped at 30.

3.text: Reign of Anger Bonus: Cull the Meek has increased damage, increased total healing by 200%, and increased healing cap by 300%.
3.html: Reign of Anger Bonus: Cull the Meek has increased damage, increased total healing by 200%, and increased healing cap by 300%.

4.text: Renekton cannot basic attack nor cast  Slice,  Dice, or  Dominus for 0.25 seconds after Cull the Meek's activation.
4.html: Renekton cannot basic attack nor cast Slice, Dice, or Dominus for 0.25 seconds after Cull the Meek's activation.

0.text: Active: Renekton empowers his next basic attack within 7 seconds to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range and strike the target twice, dealing modified physical damage and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Each strike applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and generates  Fury. Hitting an enemy  champion generates 10 bonus Fury.
0.html: Active: Renekton empowers his next basic attack within 7 seconds to have a 0.2-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range and strike the target twice, dealing modified physical damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Each strike applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and generates Fury. Hitting an enemy champion generates 10 bonus Fury.

1.text: Reign of Anger Bonus: Renekton instead strikes 3 times, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields on the target upon the first strike, as well as increasing the  stun duration to 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Reign of Anger Bonus: Renekton instead strikes 3 times, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields on the target upon the first strike, as well as increasing the stun duration to 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Ruthless Predator  resets Renekton's basic attack timer. After Ruthless Predator's standard and empowered attack cast time, Renekton cannot move nor cast  Cull the Meek,  Slice, nor  Dice for 0.528 seconds.
2.html: Ruthless Predator resets Renekton's basic attack timer. After Ruthless Predator's standard and empowered attack cast time, Renekton cannot move nor cast Cull the Meek, Slice, nor Dice for 0.528 seconds.

0.text: Active: Renekton  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through.
0.html: Active: Renekton dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through.

1.text: If Renekton hits an enemy, he can cast Dice within the next 4 seconds.
1.html: If Renekton hits an enemy, he can cast Dice within the next 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Renekton  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies he passes through.
0.html: Active: Renekton dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies he passes through.

1.text: Both Slice and Dice generate  2 Fury for each non-champion hit, and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per dash capped at 30.
1.html: Both Slice and Dice generate 2 Fury for each non-champion hit, and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per dash capped at 30.

2.text: Reign of Anger Bonus: Dice deals additional damage to enemies and inflicts them with  armor reduction for 4 seconds.
2.html: Reign of Anger Bonus: Dice deals additional damage to enemies and inflicts them with  armor reduction for 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Renekton empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 20% increased size,  25 bonus range,  20 Fury and increasing  Cull the Meek's effect radius.
0.html: Active: Renekton empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health, 20% increased size,  25 bonus range, 20 Fury and increasing Cull the Meek's effect radius.

1.text: During this time, he deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and generates 5 Fury per second, up to a maximum of 75 Fury.
1.html: During this time, he deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies and generates 5 Fury per second, up to a maximum of 75 Fury.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 12% /  8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  525

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • brk
  • bork
  • botrk
  • mist

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+35 armor
+35 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
Unique – Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks create an explosion around you, applying a burn to all nearby enemies that deals your current Immolate damage to them over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% tenacity, 50 bonus health and 5% slow resist.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

1.originHTML: +  +  800

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • funfire
  • sunborn

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+40 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

Against  champions, the healing is increased by 300%.
